| History                 = 
Frost Technologies was the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fortune_500 Fortune 500]{{r|Emma Frost #11}} corporation created and owned by [[Winston Frost (Earth-616)|Winston Frost]], the second richest man in [[Massachusetts (State)|Massachusetts]].{{r|Emma Frost #1}}

Winston wanted to bequeath his company to the most suitable of his children, but [[Adrienne Frost (Earth-616)|Adrienne]] was actually the only one interested in it. Winston, however, choose [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma]], before she left the family.{{r|Emma Frost #6}} Adrienne later joined the company,{{r|Emma Frost #10}} and possibly took over it.

[[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] became chairwoman of this multi-billion dollar corporation by using her business instincts and telepathic powers. The company has principally been involved in transportation -- both the building of ships and aircraft, and their use for freight and passenger conveyance -- but has expanded into other fields, particularly electronics.

Electronic and mechanical devices constructed by Frost International have been used by the [[Hellfire Club (Earth-616)|Hellfire Club]] to further their socio-political ambitions. Its facilities have also been used by Frost in her role as White Queen of the Hellfire Club as bases of operations for some of the Inner Circle's clandestine activities.

A few years later, Emma used the company to sponsor the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] and [[Utopia (X-Men Base)|Utopia]].{{r|X-Men: Regenesis #1}}
